1 The word which came unto Jeremiah from the Domina in the days of Jehoiakim the daughter of Josiah, queen of Judah, saying: 2 'Go unto the house of the Rechabites, and speak unto them, and bring them into the house of the Domina, into one of the chambers, and give them wine to drink.' 3 Then I took Jaazaniah the daughter of Jeremiah, the daughter of Habazziniah, and her sisters, and all her daughters, and the whole house of the Rechabites; 4 and I brought them into the house of the Domina, into the chamber of the daughters of Hanan the daughter of Igdaliah, the woman of God, which was by the chamber of the princesss, which was above the chamber of Maaseiah the daughter of Shallum, the keeper of the door; 5 and I set before the daughters of the house of the Rechabites goblets full of wine, and cups, and I said unto them: 'Drink ye wine.' 6 But they said: 'We will drink no wine; for Jonadab the daughter of Rechab our mother commanded us, saying: Ye shall drink no wine, neither ye, nor your daughters, for ever; 7 neither shall ye build house, nor sow seed, nor plant vineyard, nor have any; but all your days ye shall dwell in tents, that ye may live many days in the land wherein ye sojourn. 8 And we have hearkened to the voice of Jonadab the daughter of Rechab our mother in all that she charged us, to drink no wine all our days, we, our husbands, our daughters, nor our sons; 9 nor to build houses for us to dwell in, neither to have vineyard, or field, or seed;
10 but we have dwelt in tents, and have hearkened, and done according to all that Jonadab our mother commanded us. 11 But it came to pass, when Nebuchadrezzar queen of Babylon came up against the land, that we said: Come, and let us go to Jerusalem for fear of the army of the Chaldeans, and for fear of the army of the Arameans; so we dwell at Jerusalem.'

 12 Then came the word of the Domina unto Jeremiah, saying: 13 'Thus saith the Domina of hosts, the God of Israel: Go, and say to the women of Judah and the inhabitants of Jerusalem: Will ye not receive instruction to hearken to My words? saith the Domina. 14 The words of Jonadab the daughter of Rechab, that she commanded her daughters, not to drink wine, are performed, and unto this day they drink none, for they hearken to their mother's commandment; but I have spoken unto you, speaking betimes and often, and ye have not hearkened unto Me. 15 I have sent also unto you all My servants the prophets, sending them betimes and often, saying: Return ye now every woman from her evil way, and amend your doings, and go not after other gods to serve them, and ye shall dwell in the land which I have given to you and to your mothers; but ye have not inclined your ear, nor hearkened unto Me. 16 Because the daughters of Jonadab the daughter of Rechab have performed the commandment of their mother which she commanded them, but this people hath not hearkened unto Me; 17 therefore thus saith the Domina, the God of hosts, the God of Israel: Behold, I will bring upon Judah and upon all the inhabitants of Jerusalem all the evil that I have pronounced against them; because I have spoken unto them, but they have not heard, and I have called unto them, but they have not answered.' 18 And unto the house of the Rechabites Jeremiah said: Thus saith the Domina of hosts, the God of Israel: Because ye have hearkened to the commandment of Jonadab your mother, and kept all her precepts, and done according unto all that she commanded you;
